Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery jar, the exterior is covered with cream-coloured burnished slip and remains of the end of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393481) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393481)
